body.text: When designing a card, all of the data is sent in the body of the `AdaptiveCard` JSON object. The data includes the following:

- **Elements** such as `TextBlock`, `RichTextBlock`, and `Image` are used to present content in card.

- **Container Objects** such as `ActionSet`, `ColumnSet`, `Container`, `FactSet`, and `ImageSet` are used to group elements together to optimze the UI/UX Design of the card.

- **Inputs** are used to display form fields in the card, so that user can consume and submit their own information. Inputs include `Text`, `Date`, `Toggle`, and `ChoiceSet`.

Webex For Developers provides a [Buttons and Cards Designer](http://developer.webex.com/buttons-and-cards-designer) that allows you to visually build a card and then copy the JSON to your application. We'll take a look into that in the next lesson.
